Question: A Dragon will inflict 2 Life loss next turn. You have 1 Life and 4 Calm. Which is the resource‑efficient plan to avoid losing Gold?
Answer: Pay the React cost (discard a card) to ignore Life loss, keeping Gold safe.
Rationale: Without enough Life you’d lose 2 × missing Life = 2 other essences per Life. Paying the React is cheaper.:contentReference[oaicite:70]{index=70}:contentReference[oaicite:71]{index=71}
